definition: li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels

sentences.english: Body Works is located in Sanlitun near the residence of the international players.
sentences.chinese: 位于工体三里屯附近，国际大腕府邸。

sentences.english: I know a great Thai restaurant in Sanlitun.
sentences.chinese: 我知道在三里屯有一家很大的泰国餐馆。

sentences.english: In Beijing, I wander around Sanlitun.
sentences.chinese: 在北京的时候我会去逛三里屯。

sentences.english: I want to rent an apartment in Sanlitun area.
sentences.chinese: 我想在三里屯附近租一个公寓。

sentences.english: We have a lot of choices in San Li Tun Bar Street.
sentences.chinese: 在三里屯酒吧街，人们可以去不同的类型酒吧。

sentences.english: Gongti Beilu , Sanlitun, Opposite to the North gate of Beijing Workers' Stadium.
sentences.chinese: 工体北路17号，三里屯，工人体育场北门正对面。

sentences.english: CD Blues Cafe & Bar, East Third Ring Rd near Agricultural Exhibition Center, Sanlitun.
sentences.chinese: 东三环北路，近农业展览馆，三里屯。

sentences.english: Distance from hotel to Sanlitun is 8km and it will spend about 20yuan for taxi.
sentences.chinese: 三里屯距离酒店约8公里，打车约人民币20元。

definition: abbr. for 北京工人體育場|北京工人体育场[Bei3 jing1 Gong1 ren2 Ti3 yu4 chang3], Workers Stadium
abbr. for 國際貿易|国际贸易[guo2 ji4 mao4 yi4]
Houhai, a lake and the area surrounding it in central Beijing
Wangfujing neighborhood of central Beijing, famous for shopping
Haidian inner district of northeast Beijing, includes Peking University, Tsinghua University 清華大學|清华大学[Qing1 hua2 da4 xue2] and Zhongguancun 中關村|中关村[Zhong1 guan1 cun1]
Xizhimen neighborhood of Beijing/the main northwest gate of Beijing
Zhongguancun neighborhood of Beijing, containing Peking University, famous for electronics shops and bookstores
Shichahai, scenic area of northwest Beijing with three lakes
